fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 40.25 points or 0.21% to settle at 19,306.05. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 2.60% to 12.40. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
